reviews.text:
Vegan restaurant downtown. If you're vegetarian or vegan, this place is wow!
Great food, friendly service, dogs ok (if you're seated outside).
On the other...
As always everything was amazing from 4th & State! Everything at this restaurant is all vegan but you wouldn't know if they didn't tell you . The breakfast...
This review comes a  month later. Establishment I found very clean. Service was good. Food IMHO is typical vegan creativity without the WOW factor. However,...
